positive_examples: This is an example of cruiser.
We observed cruiser in this context.
A typical case of cruiser would involve these features.
The concept of cruiser applies here.
A large warship designed for long-range operations and armed with heavy guns or missiles.
negative_examples: This is an example of aircraft carrier, not cruiser.
This represents military ship in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: AircraftCarrier, or other types of MilitaryShip

definition: A large warship capable of independent operations at sea.
